subject: Cheating
Cricket (Game)
Gambling
lead_paragraph: The Mumbai police filed gambling, cheating and conspiracy charges against the son-in-law of India’s cricket chief in a scandal that has engulfed the country’s Twenty20 league.
snippet: The Mumbai police filed gambling, cheating and conspiracy charges against the son-in-law of India’s cricket chief in a scandal that has engulfed the country’s Twenty20 league.
